contexts.context: ...Also, there is good evidence that the Tribunal have been <mark>concealing</mark> the true nature of the threat posed by Dagoth Ur at...
...the Tribunal's ability to protect Morrowind from Dagoth Ur, and <mark>concealing</mark> a recent dramatic diminishing of the Tribunal's magical powers.
